SDG_GOAL: 11 Sustainable development of cities and communities
SDG_TARGET: 11.5 Reduce the adverse impact of pollutants, including on the urban environment in particular, through innovative technologies
SDG_INDICATOR: 11.5.2 Number of cities in which the average annual concentrations of major pollutants in the atmospheric air exceed the average daily maximum permissible concentrations, units
indicator_name: Direct economic loss in relation to global GDP, damage to critical infrastructure and number of disruptions to basic services, attributed to disasters
graph_title: Direct economic loss in relation to global GDP, damage to critical infrastructure and number of disruptions to basic services, attributed to disasters
